PositionInfluence

How much influence the shake has over the camera's position. All values are valid, even numbers greater than 1 and negative numbers.

Declaration
Vector3 PositionInfluence { get; set; }
Property Value
Type Description
UnityEngine.Vector3
| Improve this Doc View Source

RotationInfluence

How much influence the shake has over the camera's rotation. All values are valid, even numbers greater than 1 and negative numbers.

Declaration

Property Value
Type Description
UnityEngine.Vector3
| Improve this Doc View Source

Roughness

The roughness of the shake. Lower values are slower and smoother, higher values are faster and noisier.

float Roughness { get; set; }
